 Eyebright::
Eyebright started to whine inside Autobot's Shuttle, 'cause she was hungry. Cutie's energie had hapled her to survive a large time but she needed eat.
  x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote: ooC: I've finished Anachronox (the mistake that was Firedrill). I 
wouldn't mind if all checked him out.

-- Firedrill --> Anachronox / Pacifix --

Firedrill goes to sleep... his last thoughts were ones of 
anticipation of the adventure he was experiencing. Unfortunately for 
him, sleep does not come to those fated by doom. Not necessarily 
death, but, mistakes can be made and, as such, Anachronox begins...

------------------------------

Meanwhile, at the Autobot base, Pacifix decides to check up on 
Firedrill. After suffering the loss of both Hoist and Computron, who 
accidentally combined themselves with the ships computer in an 
experiment that went wrong, he didn't want to lose Firedrill either. 
The ships computer was now controlled by Hoist, and so Pacifix 
prepares a commlink. "Hoist, open a commlink to the Tripreds." 

A hologram of Hoist appears infront of Pacifix. Hoist's voice sounds 
over the internal speakers, "Sure Pacifix." Hoist flickers and the 
mumbles something. "Alright Go!" He says to Pacifix before 
flickering again and dissapearing.

Pacifix nods as he leaves, and speaks, "Tripreds, this is Autobot 
Commander Pacifix. I'm awaiting a report from Diplomatic Liason 
Firedrill, is he available?"
